Message.SourceString: Leapin' lizards!! Where have y'all been pannin' for Bars?!
Well you're lookin' smug as a llamacorn ridin' a 'brella...
Y'all got two choices: buy a pistol... or REACH FOR THE SKY!
I oughta start callin' you Pistol.
Don't just stand there starin'! Gimme a hand outta the dirt, willya?
Some llama tippin' varmint knocked me down flat!
You look like a rather sporting player.
Hello, old sport! Care for a shotgun?
Ahoy! Back for more firepower?
Aren't you a little rotter?
Well, how unsporting!
Is that fresh chicken?! Right-o! Good on you, old chap!
Can I interest you in a second SMG? An SSMG, one might say?
Ready to make a withdrawal?
I've been watching the markets. There's never been a better time to buy an SMG.
*TRADE OFFER* You receive: an SMG. I receive: your bars.
I hodl'd until I crashed...
Can I get some help? A hand? A generous stimulus package, perhaps?
I love doing business with an experienced marksman.
Why don't you stop looking and start shopping?
Hey, sharpshooter... Lookin' for an upgrade?
Well well well... sharpshooter's back for more.
You trying to shake me down for Bars?
Going aggro won't get you anywhere.
You there! Buy my fine assault weapons and I'll tell you a secret of the universe.
I have a REALLY good secret for you this time. I promise you don't wanna miss it.
Okay, my chips are all fixed up. I DEFINITELY have a secret for you this time.
You... really know how to handle one of these, huh?
Ahh! I'm sorry! I'M SORRY!! Please, have mercy!
Please, I've got kids! One's a gumball machine, and the other's a newspaper box!
